title: George W. Bush Speaks to the Nation
description: Selected speeches of President George W. Bush that start with his first Inaugural Address, includes his National Day of Prayer and Remembrance, his Declaration of War on Terror, his State of the Union speeches, his major speeches on the war on Iraq, his important Progress of Democracy in the Middle East speech and his famous We did not Charge...only to Retreat speech at Whitehall Palace in Britain.
author: Alan Gottlieb
